WorkItem.Description:
This is related to an earlier Discussion post, my apologies for not making it an Issue instead (wasn't sure it was a bug, but now I understand you want to err on the side of using the Issue Tracker if its close.)
 
For some combinations, I was seeing gems switching back and forth on consecutive Optimize runs. At present, I'm NOT seeing that, but then the Armory is down so I'm not using my absolute latest gear.
 
What I has seeing is that the optimizer has a better optimal rotation than the character, even after loading the results of the previous run. I think that in some situations this could cause the gear to bounce around.
 
Every stat is the same, but the optimizer gets better Optimal Rotation DPS.
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Boosts Cat DPS even when making no change

Comments.Message: Your Rip is making a purty big change there, the rest is the same (from the screenshot). I'm betting there are other abilities changing further down in the scroll area.
I'm not able to reproduce this with the provided character xml file. Optimizing the file gets the score to 11345 and subsequent optimizations remain there without further changes to gear.
I was able to reproduce this in Rawr3, but still tracking this down. It looks like energy cost of rip is very different in Rawr2 vs Rawr3.
In dev build of Rawr3 I can't reproduce this either. It was either fixed in Cat module or it's still hiding somewhere.
